com.wpruszak.blitzch.lib.interfaces

Interface ConflictResolver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConflictController

    public interface ConflictResolver
    Default git conflict resolving interface. Basic implementation of this interface is: ConflictController.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    setzo
    See Also:
    ConflictController

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • automaticResolveConflictsInFile

        void automaticResolveConflictsInFile(FileBean fileBean,
                                     String mode)
                              throws IOException
        Automatically resolves all of the git conflicts in a given file accordingly to given mode.

        This method will not ask for any permission, it will solve the conflicts itself and overwrite the file with the final result. Depending on mode given to it as a parameter the results will differ (or may differ).

        Parameters:
        fileBean - file to solve conflicts for
        mode - of conflict solving
        Throws:
        IOException - if I/O is corrupted

      • automaticResolveConflictsInDirectory

        void automaticResolveConflictsInDirectory(List<FileBean> fileBeanList,
                                          String mode)
                                   throws IOException
        Automatically resolves all of the git conflicts in a given directory accordingly to given mode.

        This method will not ask for any permission, it will solve the conflicts itself and overwrite the files with the final result. Depending on mode given to it as a parameter the results will differ (or may differ).

        Parameters:
        fileBeanList - list of files in a directory
        mode - of conflict solving
        Throws:
        IOException - if I/O is corrupted

      • interactiveResolveConflictsInFile

        void interactiveResolveConflictsInFile(FileBean fileBean)
                                throws IOException
        Interactive conflict resolving in file, whenever this method encounters git conflict it will ask what to do. Mode given to this method is interactive by default.

        After encountering conflict there will be these options:

        • Keep newer conflict version
        • Keep older conflict version
        • Keep both conflict versions, first new then old
        • Keep both conflict versions, first old then new
        • Manually fix the conflict
        Parameters:
        fileBean - file to solve conflicts for
        Throws:
        IOException - if I/O is corrupted

      • interactiveResolveConflictsInDirectory

        void interactiveResolveConflictsInDirectory(List<FileBean> fileBeanList)
                                     throws IOException
        Interactive conflict resolving in directory, whenever this method encounters git conflict it will ask what to do. Mode given to this method is interactive by default.

        After encountering conflict there will be these options:

        • Keep newer conflict version
        • Keep older conflict version
        • Keep both conflict versions, first new then old
        • Keep both conflict versions, first old then new
        • Manually fix the conflict
        Parameters:
        fileBeanList - list of files in a directory
        Throws:
        IOException - if I/O is corrupted
